attributes.action: Ensure that Army Manning Control operate in accordance with their published rules
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Military Manning Control continue to refuse to extend the service of servicemen who wish to continue to serve. This is contrary to their own published tri-service documentation and is being used to reduce future pension payments. This is detrimental to forces manning levels and is both arbitrary and discriminatory, and is not supported by the affected Unit Commanding Officers.
